inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of Cystic Fibrosis based on genotype and/or positive sweat-test
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Written informed consent based on written and spoken information
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No chronic airway-infections with Gram-negative bacteria
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Fertile, sexually active women must use contraception (p-pills, IUD or other methods with a similar Pearl-index) when participating in the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Chronic infection of the airways caused by Gram-negative bacteria (Burkholderia species, Achromobacter xylosoxidans, Pandorea apista or Stenotrophomonas maltophilia)
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Chronic infection of the airways caused by P. aeruginosa (chronic infection is defined by continuing growth of the microorganism for 6 months and/or an increase in specific, precipitating antibodies to a level of at least 2)
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Previous infection with a strain of P. aeruginosa resistant to ciprofloxacin or colistin
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Pregnant or lactating women, or sexually active women unwilling to use safe contraception (p-pills, IUD or method with similar Pearl-index) when participating in the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Severe insufficiency of the liver or kidneys as judged by the local investigator
inclusion.label: not_met
